channel.title: crash-box: a gasc demolition project » Movies

item.title: Live Diffusion Crash-Box
item.dc:creator: stevebutton
item.description: Entry Point to the video diffusion and distribution

item.title: Mise en ligne du site Crash Box
item.dc:creator: anne-valerie
item.description:
Mise en ligne du site : www.crash-box.fr, le 31 avril 2011.
Journal de bord du laboratoire de recherche artistique et véritable plateforme de diffusion vidéo, le site Crash Box est un outil d'accompagnement et de transmission de l'œuvre en cours d'élaboration. Les inscriptions en ligne sont ouvertes. L'accès personnalisé au site permet d'assister, en direct, aux films réalisés en caméras ultra-rapides des démolitions par foudroyage intégral et de recevoir les alertes successives aux événements liés à l'atelier de l'Euroméditerranée Crash Box.

item.title: CRASH BOX sur TV5 Monde
item.dc:creator: anne-valerie
item.description: <object width="480" height="300"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/Xv7aM6FoaEQ?fs=1&hl=fr_FR"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/Xv7aM6FoaEQ?fs=1&hl=fr_FR" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="480" height="300"></embed></object> Réalisation d'un reportage sur le projet Crash Box : présentation de l'artiste et de son lieu de travail, modalités de travail liées au programme des Ateliers de l'Euroméditerranée de Marseille Provence 2013 et découverte du chantier à l'origine du projet : le chantier de démolition du pont Saint Lazare en 2010.

item.title: Registered account with Mailchimp
item.dc:creator: stevebutton
item.description:
Account with Mailchimp all set up. This gives the ability for people to subscribe on the site and receive 2 types of information: 1/ An rss-to-email "newsletter". this means any new material we place on the site is automatically delivered to people as an html update/newsletter, with link back to site. Instead of waiting for people to go to site, it lets them know things exist.
2/ you can create individual e-mail postings/announcements.
People who subscribe on site are automatically added to mailing list and you can import existing mail list into program.
As well as distributing the emails, the program tracks who opened, who clicked, who visited, where they are etc. Can set up secondary emails that only go to people who click and visit for example.

item.title: Subscribe Feature
item.dc:creator: stevebutton
item.description:
Set up a sign-up form for viewers. By signing up they will automatically get e-mail "newsletter" of latest content and posts to the site. The way the news notification system functions is:
  • People sign up
  • They receive latest information.
  • How they use this information (forward it, view it etc) can be tracked
  • Where they view it can be displayed geographically -mapping

item.title: The Diffusion Menu
item.dc:creator: stevebutton
item.description: Added a menu -Diffusion. The idea behind this is there are may ways both to broadcast information from the site and also to bring back in the results and evidence of that broadcasting - through RSS, newsfeeds and other tools. [..]
